page.title: 13OUR OWN DOMESDAY SURVEY
page.content: As part of our work on the Domesday Project we sent out 250 questionaires to families living in our survey area of Croftlands and Bardsea. The questionaire covered four main topics. These were: 1.Bus services 2.Shopping 3.Leisure activities 4.Religion. 176 questionaires were returned and the results follow here and on the next three pages. ______________________________________ 1.BUS SERVICES There are fairly good bus services between Barrow and Ulverston which also serve Bardsea and Croftlands. 46% of the people in our sample never use the bus service,26% use it weekly 20% use it monthly and only 8% use the bus every day.
